archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0941
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Product owner, I want the ability to be able to bill customers in other currencies so we can cater for customers whos (for example) their head office is overseas (e.g. proctor and gamble we require to bill in $USD)

properties.value: Any other currencies then USD? Which currency should be presented during selling process? More details to be discussed during horizon 2 analysis.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
